    public class LoginActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    CS 2340 - FindMyStuff Android App Activity which displays a login screen to the user, offering registration as well.
    Author:
    TeamRocket

      • attemptToLogin

        public void attemptToLogin(android.view.View loginButton)
        Attempts to sign in or register the account specified by the login form. If there are form errors (invalid email, missing fields, etc.), the errors are presented and no actual login attempt is made.
